summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Emilia Hypoallergenic Baby Lotion - Quick-Absorbing, Non-Greasy, Alcohol-Free Baby Body Oatmeal Cream With Natural Colloidal Oatmeal for Dry Skin Eczema - Provides 24 Hour Moisturization - 8.8 fl.oz.
Review Date: 2020/09/15
Store: Emilia
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Emilia', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 2.52 x 2.24 inches; 10.12 Ounces'}
Review Text: Emilia Baby Body Lotion will really make your skin as soft as your babies! I just had to try it on myself because I have eczema and they said it is hypoallergenic. I can tell you that it doesn't irritate my skin ad the softness is really noticeable...and that you might not be able to notice on your baby because a babies skin is (usually) already soft. I am an adult that has allergies to a lot of things that show up in skin irritations, and I do not think that you can go wrong with buying this lotion. This is a great one for your newborn, baby, and the whole family. The only con would be if you don't like the smell of baby powder. It smells like a creamy baby powder, and I like it.
Review Title: What a difference in softness!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Reusable Makeup Remover Cloth Towels Set - Remove mascara, exfoliate skin, clean your face - Eraser for you makeup! Wipe your face free only with warm water - MAKEUP BLUR (Leopard Print 9-Pack)
Review Date: 2020/09/16
Store: MAKEUP BLUR
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAKEUP BLUR', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 3.7 x 1.8 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '081227858148'}
Review Text: These amazingly do the job of wiping makeup off my face without any products but warm water! It's gentle on my skin too. They are so soft, thick, and I want a blanket made of this material! I just want to hug it because it feels so nice.
Review Title: Soft and Efficient!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Empty Plastic Mini Fine Mist Spray Bottles Refillable Pump Bottle 3.4oz / 100ml Small Travel Size with Labels Funnels Cleaner
Review Date: 2020/09/16
Store: DURSI
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DURSI', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.73 x 1.73 x 5.31 inches'}
Review Text: These are FOUR (4) ounce containers! These are a little bigger than we expected. They will take up more room in a carry-on quart sized bag than I want. However, the bottles and everything that came with them work well as expected. I just wish that the seller would verify information before advertising. I took off only one star for the advertisement disappointment, but I kept the other four stars because the set works well for the size that they are.
Review Title: They are a little bigger than advertised. I measured 4 ounces!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 Pack Spray Bottles,Empty Plastic Clear Small Transparent Travel Bottles Pump Bottle Lotion Dispenser Bottle Set,Refillable Liquid Containers 3oz and 2 oz
Review Date: 2020/10/25
Store: Cehomi
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.14 x 1.1 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: These can go on an airplane or be carried anywhere because they don't leak. I like that they included pumps aw well as spray bottle tops. Each one is interchangeable when you get them. My pump straws were too long, so I put them in the taller bottles, and put the spray tops on the smaller bottles. The pumps have a neck brace so it can't be pushed down by accident. There is a little funnel, and three lids for the sprayers. However, I did measure the size of the larger bottle with liquid and it holds more than the 100 ml that they advertised (3.30oz). They actually holds about 4 ounces, so keep that in mind if you are limited on space when traveling. The pumps and sprayers work well - they will be used on a future vacation.
Review Title: Perfect Set!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Review Date: 2020/11/07
Store: Qiray
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
Review Text: These hair ties are exactly as advertised. You get 10 ties in 5 different colors. They have beads that resemble pearls attached to them. I wondered if they would look nice or if they would be too twisted to see the pearly beads on the outside. The result is that they look absolutely perfect!! You don't even have to do anything special to make them look nice. Just put it on as you normally would and the beads show well along with a nicely colored scrunchy hair tie! Good value!
Review Title: Looks really nice!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gentlehomme Face Moisturizer For Men - Mens Facial Lotion with Neroli Essential Oil Scent - Collagen & Stem Cells - Daily Anti-Aging Moisturizer for Dry & Oily Skin - 4 oz
Review Date: 2020/11/16
Store: Gentlehomme
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Gentlehomme', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 2.83 x 2.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001419924'}
Review Text: This moisturizer leaves my boyfriend's skin so soft feeling. The scent is light and very likable! When the container arrives, it is in a box that looks really nice. After you unscrew the cap of the container, there is a plastic moisture cap that lays on top. That is good to keep on the container because it keeps keep moisture inside. It has a little finger handle on the top so it is easy to remove. It's a great product but it costs a bit too much as there are other products that can do the same for a lot less.
Review Title: Leaves skin SO Soft, BUT Propylene Glycol is the 2nd ingredient (water is 1st)!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
Review Date: 2020/11/30
Store: tiggell
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Size': '20 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.85 x 2.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '795853588163'}
Review Text: These work as advertised. Big enough to fit my large fingertips without hurting them. They are a hard clear plastic with a metal rod and a metal spring. Make sure when you get yours to check the back end to see if the springs are aligned in the slots. If not, slide them with a fingernail or tool until they go into the slot. The batch that I received have metal springs that barely make it into the slot, which makes the spring pop-out if I open the clips all the way. If the springs were long enough, these would get a 5 star rating from me. As they are, I cannot recommend them. However, I do like that they come individually wrapped so they could be gifted in sets of 5 or 10 and the receiver would know the clips are unused.
Review Title: Versatile, but watch out for short springs that come loose!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DAN Technology Anti-Scald 200℉-500℉ Electric Press Hot Comb for Black Hair, Beard and Wigs, Ceramic Unisex Hair Beard Straightener and Curler, Dual Voltage for Travel, Home and Salon Use
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: DAN Technology
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DAN Technology', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Item Weight': '0.6 Pounds', 'Package Dimensions': '12.9 x 4.8 x 2.4 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'DAN Technology'}
Review Text: The anti scold comb protector is the best addition to this type of hair straightener. It keeps your head and ears from getting burned, while it lets your hair glide through the hot slits of the comb. The hot comb can be used for people with any colored hair. I know because I tried it on my slightly wavy thin light colored hair, and to my amazement, it worked! It has a digital display and a 360 degree cord (it can spin in circles without tangling). The temperature control knob is right where I place my hand, so I have to make sure that I don't hit it by accident. Other than that, it performs well, as advertised.
Review Title: The hot comb can be used for people with any color of hair, not just "Black Hair, Beard and Wigs"
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual showcases a strong preference for personal care products focusing on skin sensitivity, effectiveness, and family suitability. They rate hypoallergenic and gentle formulations highly, indicating a need for products that cater to delicate skin, especially for both themselves and family members, with a notable focus on moisturizing efficacy.

In addition to skincare, there is a distinctly practical interest in reusable and eco-friendly items, as evidenced by their purchase of makeup remover cloths. These products resonate with their values on sustainability while also highlighting a desire for efficiency and ease in daily routines.

Quality is consistently prioritized, with high ratings for softness, effectiveness, and performance across diverse categories, though there is a clear sensitivity to pricing; they express concern over price versus value in a couple of reviews. This suggests they are willing to invest in quality but seek confirmation that products deliver on promised benefits.

Overall, the core preferences center around gentle, effective personal care, an inclination towards sustainable practices, emphasis on quality and performance, and a cautious approach to pricing. This user appears to be a thoughtful shopper, carefully balancing quality, family needs, and cost-effectiveness in their purchases.

target_interaction.title: Made well. Comfortable. Stretches without breaking.
target_interaction.text:
[[VIDEOID:649d342f2c61e6aa9312654e4b54ed54]] The first thing I noticed when I received these is that they look exactly like the add photos. They are crafted well with a good choice of soft fabric for the covering.

CONSTRUCTION: Inside of the fabric there is a skinny headband that can stretch to a huge width without breaking, and it goes right back into the shape that it came in. The skinny headbands have a semi-stiff, but flexible piece (like thick stiff felt) around them to support the fabric to the width that is shown in the photos.

Please watch the video that I uploaded to see the flexibility and the other things that I mentioned that is not written here. These are a really good product! As I am writing this we are still wearing masks due to the covid-19 pandemic. These headbands are really helpful in keeping my hair out of my face and off of my mask when shopping. Having a comfortable headband is important to me when I also wear glasses and a mask.
target_interaction.title_meta: HOKPA Knotted Headbands for Women 6 Pack, 3 Dots Turban Headbands and 3 Leopard Headbands, Fashion Wide Knot Hair Hoop Headwrap Headwear Hair Bands Accessories for Girls

videos.title: Made well. Comfortable. Stretches without breaking.
